metadata.name: Edith Restored
metadata.description:
[b]"But Lot's wife looked back, and she became a pillar of salt." - Genesis 19:26[/b]
The unused secret character from Antibirth has been restored and improved, with updated gameplay for Repentance!
[h2]Features[/h2] [b]1 new character[/b] unlocked by defeating The Beast. [b]14 unlocks[/b] for Edith's completion marks.
[h2]Restored Edith[/h2]
Edith is a soul heart character that moves via sliding along the room's grid, moving one tile at a time. She is only able to move in cardinal directions, but is able to perform an omni-directional jump that can be aimed with the bomb button.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SWgmjPv.gif[/img]
The stomp deals damage and knockback to nearby enemies. Killing an enemy with a stomp grants a short moment of invincibility. Edith's stomp recharges in 3 seconds, charging faster while standing still. Bombs can be placed normally while the stomp is not charged (Configurable).
[img]https://i.imgur.com/xivZL4Q.gif[/img]
Pressing the swap key (Control on keyboard) will toggle Edith's stomp to consume a bomb, causing an explosion upon landing. This explosion inherits all bomb effects.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PlLhZLK.gif[/img]
[h2]Caution![/h2] [b][u][url=https://repentogon.com]REPENTOGON[/url] is required for this mod to function. It will NOT work without it![/u][/b]
